[[module css]]
#page-content .image-change-wrapper {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 567px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  height: 850px;
}

#page-content .image-change-wrapper .image-base,
#page-content .image-change-wrapper .image-top {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 567px;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  transition: 1s ease-in-out;
}

#page-content .image-change-wrapper.step-start .image-top {
  transition: 0.1s step-start;
}

#page-content .image-change-wrapper .image-top:hover {
  opacity: 0;
  transition: 3.5s ease-in-out;
}
[[/module]]
author: Mint chocolate
